function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of ventilation and indoor air quality can lead to the spread of contagious diseases within the building environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and illness among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of ventilation systems and implementation of air purification technologies.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems, air quality sensors.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with compromised immune systems.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and health and safety officers."},{"Description":"Close spatial organization and lack of physical distancing measures can contribute to the transmission of contagious diseases among occupants.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of person-to-person transmission of infectious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement spatial reorganization, clear signage for physical distancing, and flexible workspace design.","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, space utilization software, wayfinding systems.","People":"All building occupants and visitors.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and workplace health and safety committees."},{"Description":"Inadequate temperature control and fluctuations can weaken the immune systems of building occupants, increasing their susceptibility to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher vulnerability to infections and slower recovery from illnesses.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of HVAC systems, provision of individual temperature controls, and thermal comfort optimization.","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, HVAC zoning systems, temperature and humidity sensors.","People":"All building occupants, particularly those with pre-existing health conditions.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and health and safety officers."}]}
